title: Candy Watch Face
summary: Beautiful and high quality watch faces!
description: Candy Watch Face for Android Wear WatchSupports any screen resolution and form.Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0Android Wear devices only, this is not a widget or live wallpaperTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose this application as your watch face3. You may have to wait a minute or so to transfer to your watch over BluetoothIf you have any issues please contact me.Please rate. Thanks!
descriptionHTML:
Candy Watch Face for Android Wear Watch

Supports any screen resolution and form.

Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0
Android Wear devices only, this is not a widget or live wallpaper

To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose this application as your watch face
3. You may have to wait a minute or so to transfer to your watch over Bluetooth

If you have any issues please contact me.

Please rate. Thanks!
comments: Would have given five stars if showed date too
Sony SW3 Looks great...spiral turns and colours change...very nice!
Brill Thanks for removing the logo
